items.summary: Store contact form submissions in the backend. Add a Motoko data type and stable storage for form entries containing: name (Text), email (Text), businessName (Text), message (Text), and a timestamp. Expose a submit function that accepts these fields and appends the entry to stable storage, and an admin query to retrieve all submissions.

Wire the frontend contact form in the BottomCTA section to call the backend submitContactForm canister method via the existing useActor hook. On successful canister call, show the success confirmation message. On error, display an inline error message prompting the user to try again.

Replace the 'Book a Free 15-Min Strategy Call' button in the BottomCTA section with an inline contact/booking form. The form should collect: Full Name, Email Address, Business Name, and a brief message or 'What do you want to automate?' textarea. Include a submit button labeled 'Book My Free Strategy Call'. The form should match the existing dark theme (near-black background, teal accent, Inter typography) and display a success confirmation message after submission.
